mapper.select: SELECT b.id, b.track_team_id, b.title, b.url, b.content, b.created_at, tm.user_id as member_id, u.name as member_name, tm.role as member_role FROM track_project_board b LEFT JOIN track_team_member tm ON b.track_team_id = tm.track_team_id LEFT JOIN user u ON tm.user_id = u.id WHERE b.id = #{boardId} AND b.track_project_id = #{trackProjectId} AND b.track_team_id = #{trackTeamId} AND b.is_deleted = false;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO track_project_board ( track_project_id, track_team_id, title, url, content, thumbnail, user_id, created_at, updated_at, is_deleted ) VALUES ( #{trackProjectId}, #{trackTeamId}, #{board.title}, #{board.url}, #{board.content}, #{board.thumbnail}, #{userId}, NOW(), NOW(), false )
mapper.update: UPDATE track_project_board SET title = #{board.title}, url = #{board.url}, content = #{board.content}, thumbnail = #{board.thumbnail}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{boardId} AND track_project_id = #{trackProjectId} AND track_team_id = #{trackTeamId} AND is_deleted = false
UPDATE track_project_board SET is_deleted = true, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{boardId} AND is_deleted = false
